name: Habit Farm
description:
Welcome to Habit Farm, where you can grow healthy habits. Choose a plant for each habit, water them whenever you succeed, and watch your plants grow little by little.

This is for Regenerate Game Jam 2022.

This is our very first C# program, and a learning project for the team to better understand the basics of the language. It is a terminal-only game :) .

This game is a work in progress.

Currently, you can:
- Give your name
- Add habits
- Quit the game

In the future you will be able to:
- See your habits
- Give habits a plant 
- Water the plants when you do your habit
- Watch your plants grow when you follow your habit
